projects.title: FeMaSR
projects.description: Feature Matching in Explicit and Implicit Manners for Real-World Super-Resolution with efficient feature alignment.

projects.title: FastVQA
projects.description: A fast and accurate video quality assessment method using efficient neural networks for real-time video quality evaluation.

projects.title: DFDNet
projects.description: Deep Face Deblurring Network for high-quality face image restoration from blurry inputs using dictionary-based feature matching.

projects.title: IQA-PyTorch
projects.description: PyTorch Toolbox for Image Quality Assessment, including PSNR, SSIM, LPIPS, FID, NIQE, NRQM(Ma), MUSIQ, TOPIQ, NIMA, DBCNN, BRISQUE, PI and more...

projects.title: PSFRGAN
projects.description: A progressive approach that combines semantic understanding with style transformation for high-quality blind face restoration.

projects.title: SPARNet
projects.description: A face super-resolution method that learns spatial attention mechanisms to enhance facial details and improve reconstruction quality.
